task1.explanation: For the festival appearance, clause 1.2 specifies a 12.5% commission on gross payment ($45,000 Ã— 0.125 = $5,625). For the brand endorsement, clause 2.1 outlines a tiered structure: 20% on first $50,000 ($10,000) and 15% on remaining $25,000 ($3,750), totaling $13,750. For streaming royalties, clauses 3.1-3.2 specify 10% commission after 15% platform fees: $12,500 - 15% ($1,875) = $10,625 net, then 10% commission ($1,062.50). All calculations follow the contract terms precisely.

task2.resolution_steps: 1) For Sports Drink Campaign: Contact payer to verify if $2,500 was withheld for taxes or other reasons. Request documentation. If error, demand immediate payment plus interest per contract clause 4.2. 2) For Magazine Photo Shoot: Review contract for possible kill fees or expenses. Contact magazine accounting department with invoice copy. Escalate to editor if unresolved in 7 days. 3) For TV Commercial: Verify if overpayment was intentional (bonus) or error. If error, offer to return $5,000 or credit toward future work. Adjust commission accordingly. Document all communications and follow up in writing within 48 hours of each call.

task3.collection_strategy: Priority given to deposits (High) as they're required before services are rendered. Send reminders 7 days before deposit due dates. For main payments, initiate collection process immediately after due date: 1) Day 1: System-generated invoice. 2) Day 7: Polite email reminder. 3) Day 15: Phone call + formal notice. 4) Day 30: Late fees applied per contract. 5) Day 45: Escalate to legal. Track FilmVision Gala closely given their current late payment. For Brand Ambassador deal, confirm deposit clears before client travels to shoot location.
